page.title: 06Saturday in Dunnington
page.content: My name is Leslie King. I am 10 years old. On Saturday I got up a 9-00am. Breakfast was a bowl of Rice Krispies. After I dressed, I went out on my bike until 10-30am when we all went to Evesham in the car to do the shopping. We got home at half-past eleven. We put all the food away and then had fish and chips for lunch. In the afternoon my friends and I played 'Off-side'. This is a game where 2 people on bikes ride in the same direction trying to knock the other off by cutting in front of him. At 2-00pm we went to the churchyard to put fresh flowers on my Grandad's grave. When we got home we watched 'Street Hawk' on the television. When that was finished we played 'Cops and Robbers' on our bikes. We had tea at 5-00pm. Later we bought ice-cream from the van. I went to bed at 9-30pm.
